aboutPage.title: Comtehno
aboutPage.text: - This is a modern educational institution where students receive quality education and skills that are in demand in the labor market.
aboutPage.missionContent: Training competitive specialists who meet the requirements and expectations of stakeholders, who are proficient in information technologies and who are able to effectively solve the problems of digital transformation of modern society for the sustainable development of regions.
aboutPage.valuesContent: - professionalism and motivation of personnel to perform quality work; - team approach to solving complex tasks and issues; - effective management, assessed through its impact on society, sustainability of the college's development; - competitiveness of specialists capable of adapting to digital transformation; - implementation of computer technologies for digitalization and sustainable development of the country's regions.
aboutPage.visionContent: Bishkek College of Computer Systems and Technologies is a highly organized, mobile, competent and successfully functioning institution of secondary vocational education of an open type, constantly ensuring the improvement of the quality of education and promptly responding to changes in the expectations, needs and demands of consumers of the educational services market, capable of perceiving, implementing and disseminating new knowledge on digital and computer technologies.
